greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of (1+phi)-divisors of n (cf. A061389).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 1+Sum_{k=1..e, gcd(k, e)=1} p^k.
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[p_?PrimeQ] = p + 1; a[n_] := Times @@ (1 + Sum[If[GCD[k, Last[#]] == 1, First[#]^k, 0], {k, 1, Last[#]}] & ) /@ FactorInteger[n]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 71}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 04 2012 *)
program: a069915 n = product $ zipWith sum_1phi (a027748_row n) (a124010_row n)
where sum_1phi p e = 1 + sum [p ^ k | k <- a038566_row e]
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 23 2002
